task_name: FE-Impl: Develop MainLayout component with responsive structure
resource_notes: Core layout component, requires strong understanding of Material-UI responsive hooks.
alternative_approach: Could be assigned to a senior dev for faster completion, but is a good task for a mid-level.
risk_factors: Incorrect implementation will affect all subsequent UI stories.
mitigation_strategy: Thorough code review by Frontend Lead.

task_name: BE-Impl: Implement JWT authentication guard and strategy
resource_notes: Security-critical component. Requires deep understanding of JWT validation against a JWKS endpoint.
alternative_approach: None. Must be done by an experienced backend developer.
risk_factors: RISK-007: Improper implementation could lead to major security vulnerabilities.
mitigation_strategy: Mandatory security code review by Tech Lead and Security Team.

task_name: FE-Impl: Develop Login UI and integrate with Cognito OAuth flow
resource_notes: Requires expertise in OAuth 2.0 PKCE flow for SPAs. Security is paramount.
alternative_approach: Could be split between two developers (UI vs. logic), but a single owner is preferred for security consistency.
risk_factors: Incorrect token handling can lead to XSS or other session vulnerabilities.
mitigation_strategy: Follow industry best practices for SPA token management. Security review is mandatory.

task_name: BE-Impl: Implement Secure Formula Execution Lambda with isolated-vm
resource_notes: Highest security risk task. Requires a developer with deep knowledge of Node.js VMs and security sandboxing.
alternative_approach: Engage a security contractor specializing in this area.
risk_factors: RISK-002: A sandbox escape vulnerability would be critical.
mitigation_strategy: Rigorous security code review, penetration testing, and minimal privilege IAM role.

task_name: FE-Impl: Develop wizard step 3 (Define Formulas) with validation
resource_notes: Complex state management for real-time validation and integration of a code editor.
alternative_approach: Simplify to basic textarea without syntax highlighting if time is constrained, but with high UX penalty.
risk_factors: Performance issues with real-time parsing on every keystroke.
mitigation_strategy: Implement debouncing on the validation logic. Choose a lightweight parsing library.

task_name: FE-Impl: Develop background synchronization and conflict resolution logic
resource_notes: High risk of data loss if not implemented correctly. Requires extensive testing of edge cases.
alternative_approach: Use a third-party library like PouchDB or RxDB to handle sync, but this adds a large dependency.
risk_factors: RISK-001: Data loss or corruption due to flaws in sync logic.
mitigation_strategy: Extensive E2E testing with network manipulation. Pair programming on critical logic.
